name: Isolation (itch) (Exhaston)
description:
Best enjoyed in the dark. If it doesnt run well, use the "simple" graphics preset in the menu. As of now the menu resets on loads, but the settings take effect! If you find any bugs, please post them in the comments.
HOW TO PLAY: WASD : Movement L-Shift : Running Spacebar : Jump L-Mouse  :  Interact R-Mouse : Toggle Flashlight Current objectives for development:
  1. Improved sound, and more accurate sounds
  2. Better system for progress, and actual puzzles
  3. AI improvements and more mechanics
  4. Full Controller support
  5. More content as maps etc.
Stuck? -------------------------------------------------------- Gather 9 sigils to leave the house. Look for keys, unlock doors.

Heavily inspired by Phasmophobia.

Made in Unity,

other softwares used: Blender, Krita, Audacity, Substance.
